Dopey looks funny and then starts skipping at you.

dwarves.name: Happy
jokes: I have nothing but respect for you, and not much of that.
Time flies like an arrow. Fruit flies like a banana.
He may look like an idiot and talk like an idiot but don't let that fool you. He really is an idiot.
I never forget a face, but in your case I'll be glad to make an exception.
I have had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn't it.
If I held you any closer I would be on the other side of you.
I must confess, I was born at a very early age.

idleAIConfig.noticeMessage: Sleepy yawns and stretches before picking up his pick and starting towards you.

trackingAIConfig.stopMessage: Sleepy yawns and closes his eyes and starts snoring.

idleAIConfig.noticeMessage: Bashful meeps loudly as he notices you.

trackingAIConfig.stopMessage: Bashful shyly stops and pulls his arms behind him.
